text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia cernua is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.  Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forests and subtropical or tropical high-altitude shrubland. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Manzanares, J.M. & Pitman, N. (2003). "Tillandsia cernua". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2003: e.T43331A10797343. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2003.RLTS.T43331A10797343.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
